import React, {useContext} from 'react'; import {Context} from "./store/appContext"; import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik'; const Formulario = () => { const { store, actions} = useContext(Context); onSubmit = (values) =>{ console.log(values) } return ( <> {( {errors} ) => (
)} ); } export default Formulario;
